online.common
Class commonRootApplet

java.lang.Object
  online.common.commonRootApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, OnlineConstants, RootAppletProtocol
public abstract class commonRootApplet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, RootAppletProtocol, OnlineConstants

this is the common implementation of many things that are nominally handled by the applet root.

Author:
ddyer
